name: Binance-Peg BUSD
description: Alternative Binance-Peg BUSD (BUSD) refers to versions or variations of the Binance-Peg BUSD token available across different blockchain networks or use cases. These alternatives maintain the same core principle of being a stablecoin pegged 1:1 to the U.S. dollar but may differ in deployment or specific functionalities to support various ecosystems.
